Blog.post: Hi, this is where we can leave messages to each other and have fun sharing things about the family and life, etc.

Mom's Trip to California, Yea! Keep posted here. Add comments if you want. She's here from June 1-15, 2004. It's for urlLink TJ 's graduation, Yea! Picked her up ok from Oakland Airport. TJ is graduating on June 11... wow -- we're all getting really old! Ha.

urlLink Thought about this lately? Be encouraged today! Hebrews 4:12 (NLT) For the word of God is full of living power. It is sharper than the sharpest knife, cutting deep into our innermost thoughts and desires. It exposes us for what we really are.

Our big outreach to teens is tonight, Friday. Hundreds will come and receive an invitation to accept Christ. Please pray for this event and if you are around, come on out and volunteer. We would love to have you!

Hey, urlLink Yours Truly is going to have a CD Release party on Friday night in Oakland, CA at iMusicast.com! It costs $8 to get in for the show, but be sure to bring CD money -- only $10.00 each. It's a great price, makes a great gift, and guess what? You know these guys! yeah..

CD has been released! Yours Truly is a band that includes Luke Franks (Lead vocals, guitar) , Clark Abbott (Guitar and sometimes vocals), TJ Hohm (Drums and background vocals), and Brant (Bass guitar). Call us if you want to get hold of a CD.
It's all over for another El Sobrante School Year! We are so proud of all the students, faculty, and administration. Yea for a job well done. See ya in September!

Graduation is over for TJ. 8th grade graduation is over for El Sobrante Christian School. Mom is home today from her visit .... Ahhhh .... summertime! Leave a comment here or post something new! We'd love to hear from you!
"You also be ready, for the Son of Man is coming at an hour you do not expect." Luke 12:40
Looking forward to this weekend. TJ's graduation on Friday night. Sunday afternoon -- Open house for the Grad. from 2PM - 5PM.

Would you love a week guided by God gaining confidence in your Christian walk each day? Remember God is on your side! Our Father loves us more than we can even comprehend! Let His "strong arm" rule your choices this week! Isaiah 26:3 (NLT) You will keep in perfect peace all who trust in you, whose thoughts are fixed on you!

Check it out tonight, it's free. TJ is the Drummer/Background Vocalist in the band called urlLink Yours Truly . You can check out their site and/or go to iMusicast to check them out live (Friday, July 23, 2004, 7:30 PM). Hey, if you see them leave a comment right here! urlLink
urlLink Oh, yeah. Wanna see a picture of TJ and his girlfriend, Alli?
Yeah, baby! It's the Annual A's Fireworks Game for Central Assembly on Friday. Dozens of the ol' church family will be there to see the A's compete for yet another home victory!
So, what have you been up to this summer? Leave a comment right here and fill us in. That's right ANYONE can PARTICIPATE on this site!!

I saw this and thought of how unique and precious we are in the sight of God. He loves you very much ... won't you let him bring peace into your life right now? urlLink Psalm 139:14 (NIV) I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

In the Bible, you see David who is said to have a heart after God constantly seek to get back to the source. Without God all perspective changes, we are week in our thinking and wisdom. Without God we are lacking in our optimism and failing in our answers to life's challenges. Psalm 54:4 (NLT) But God is my helper. The Lord is the one who keeps me alive! Getting back to the basics, where God is our first choice in all of our decisions and allowing His viewpoint into our daily living ... well it brings life into our journey. Seek the Lord's help today no matter what comes your way. .... You can leave your own comment - just click on the link below this message
